welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bolu, where lush greenery meets historic charm! Known for its stunning natural beauty, warm hospitality, and delightful cuisine, we invite you to explore and savor all that Bolu has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Bol-aş
restaurants.description: Bol-aş is a turkish restaurant located in Bolu.
